bdglue2.utility.schemadef

Class BigDataName

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.utility.schemadef.BigDataName

  • public class BigDataName
extends Object
    Utility class responsible for converting invalid table or column names to valid ones. It makes use of a regular expression to identify the invalid characters and replaces them with the specified "valid" character.

    In most cases, the only valid non-alphanumeric character is "_", and names may not begin with a number of '_'. This is a utility class that takes care of the transformations.

    This class is used by both SchemaDef and by BDGlue itself.

      • BigDataName

        public BigDataName(String regEx,
                   String replaceChar,
                   String firstChar)
        Instantiate in instance of BigDataName, using the parameters passed in to configure it as desired.
        Parameters:
        regEx - the regular expression to use in substituion.
        replaceChar - the character to substitute for invalid characters.
        firstChar - the character to prepend to names that begin with an invalid char.
